name: autoremoteserver
description: A cross-plattform AutoRemote-Server based on node.js (AutoNode)
author: Kai Wegner

scripts.start: node_modules/forever/bin/forever start --silent -p . -m 1 -a -l logs/AutoNode.log -o logs/AutoNode.log -e logs/AutoNode.log --pidFile AutoNode.pid --uid 'AutoNode' --minUptime 1000 --spinSleepTime 1000 server.js
